description:
When your future is in question, our team at The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., in Davenport, Florida, has the answers. We have spent decades handling personal injury incidents that include matters such as the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Premises liability and slip-and-falls
  • Dog and animal bites
  • Workplace incidents and workers' compensation
  • Insurance disputes and bad faith insurance

Understandably, suffering a personal injury leaves you in a vulnerable position. Not only have you encountered physical pain, but the emotional and financial implications of the incident can be enormous, as well. When you work with our law offices, you are enlisting the help of attorneys who are on your side and serving as your advocate throughout the legal process. We address your concerns and clearly explain your options so that you can begin your road to recovery with some peace of mind.

Over the years, we have returned millions of dollars to people throughout Florida. As a result, we have been recognized in the legal community with honors including a listing in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best and a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

Just as importantly, we are known for our exceptional customer service. We offer free initial consultations and virtual appointments. Additionally, we have team members fluent in both English and Spanish. As a matter of convenience, The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., accepts credit cards.
